articles.description: Father Jamie Spears ‘saved Britney’s life’ says lawyer in response to the #FreeBritney movement that has advocated for the pop star
articles.content:
Fans of Britney Spears who believe her father should be ousted from his role overseeing her conservatorship have it so wrong, his lawyer has said.
The pop stars finances and personal affairs have be… [+3091 chars]

articles.title: JAN MOIR: Never mind bias audits, Gordon Ramsay's BBC balderdash is an insult to us ALL - Daily Mail
articles.description: JAN MOIR: Do you want to understand what is wrong with the BBC, why it is in crisis and why so many people are refusing to pay their licence fee? Look no further than Gordon Ramsay's new show.
articles.content:
